#mn	fmt	ops	encoding
#
#Arithmetic Instructions
#
add	R	rrr	000000,r1,r2,r0,00000,100000
addi	I	rri	001000,r1,r0,i2
addiu	I	rri	001001,r1,r0,i2
addu	R	rrr	000000,r1,r2,r0,00000,100001
clo	R	rr	011100,r1,r0,r0,00000,100001
clz 	R 	rr	011100,r1,r0,r0,00000,100000
div	R	rr	000000,r0,r1,0000000000,011010
divu	R	rr	000000,r0,r1,0000000000,011011
madd	R	rr	011100,r0,r1,00000,00000,000000
maddu	R	rr	011100,r0,r1,00000,00000,000001
msub	R	rr	011100,r0,r1,00000,00000,000100
msubu	R	rr	011100,r0,r1,00000,00000,000101
mul	R	rrr	011100,r1,r2,r0,00000,000010
mult	R	rr	000000,r0,r1,0000000000,011000
multu	R	rr	000000,r0,r1,0000000000,011001
seb	R	rr	011111,00000,r1,r0,10000,100000
seh	R	rr	011111,00000,r1,r0,11000,100000
slt	R	rrr	000000,r1,r2,r0,00000,101010
slti	I	rri	001010,r1,r0,i2
sltiu	I	rri	001011,r1,r0,i2
sltu	R	rrr	000000,r1,r2,r0,00000,101011
sub	R	rrr	000000,r1,r2,r0,00000,100010
subu	R	rrr	000000,r1,r2,r0,00000,100011
#
#Branch and Jump Instructions
#
b	I	i	000100,00000,00000,d0
bal	I	ri	000001,00000,10001,d1
beq	I	rri	000100,r0,r1,d2
bgez	I	ri	000001,r0,00001,d1
bgezal	I	ri	000001,r0,10001,d1
bgtz	I	ri	000111,r0,00000,d1
blez	I	ri	000110,r0,00000,d1
bltz	I	ri	000001,r0,00000,d1
bltzal	I	ri	000001,r0,10000,d1
bne	I	rri	000101,r0,r1,d2
j	J	t	000010,t0
jal	J	t	000011,t0
# jalr	R	rr	000000,r1,00000,r0,00000,001001
jr	R	r	000000,r0,0000000000,00000,001000
#
#Instruction Control Instructions
#
ehb	R		000000,00000,00000,00000,00011,000000
halt	R		111111,00000000000000000000000000
nop	R		000000,00000,00000,00000,00000,000000
ssnop	R		000000,00000,00000,00000,00001,000000
#
#Load, Store, and Memory Control Instructions
#
lb	I	rm	100000,b1,r0,o1
lbu	I	rm	100100,b1,r0,o1
lh	I	rm	100001,b1,r0,o1
lhu	I	rm	100101,b1,r0,o1
ll	I	rm	110000,b1,r0,o1
lw	I	rm	100011,b1,r0,o1
lwl	I	rm	100010,b1,r0,o1
lwr	I	rm	100110,b1,r0,o1
sb	I	rm	101000,b1,r0,o1
sc	I	rm	111000,b1,r0,o1
sh	I	rm	101001,b1,r0,o1
sw	I	rm	101011,b1,r0,o1
swl	I	rm	101010,b1,r0,o1
swr	I	rm	101110,b1,r0,o1
#
#Logical Instructions
#
and	R	rrr	000000,r1,r2,r0,00000,100100
andi	I	rri	001100,r1,r0,i2
lui	I	ri	001111,00000,r0,i1
nor	R	rrr	000000,r1,r2,r0,00000,100111
or	R	rrr	000000,r1,r2,r0,00000,100101
ori	I	rri	001101,r1,r0,i2
xor	R	rrr	000000,r1,r2,r0,00000,100110
xori	I	rri	001110,r1,r0,i2
#
#Move Instructions
#
mfhi	R	r	000000,0000000000,r0,00000,010000
mflo	R	r	000000,0000000000,r0,00000,010010
movn	R	rrr	000000,r1,r2,r0,00000,001011
movz	R	rrr	000000,r1,r2,r0,00000,001010
mthi	R	r	000000,r0,000000000000000,010001
mtlo	R	r	000000,r0,000000000000000,010011
rdhwr	R	rr	011111,00000,r0,r1,00000,111011
#
#Shift Instructions
#
rotr	R	rrs	000000,0000,1,r1,r0,s2,000010
rotrv	R	rrr	000000,r2,r1,r0,0000,1,000110
sll	R	rrs	000000,00000,r1,r0,s2,000000
sllv	R	rrr	000000,r2,r1,r0,00000,000100
sra	R	rrs	000000,00000,r1,r0,s2,000011
srav	R	rrr	000000,r2,r1,r0,00000,000111
srl	R	rrs	000000,00000,r1,r0,s2,000010
srlv	R	rrr	000000,r2,r1,r0,00000,000110
#
#Cop0 Instuctions
#
mfc0	R	rrc	010000,00000,r0,r1,00000000,c2
mtc0	R	rrc	010000,00100,r0,r1,00000000,c2
tlbp	R		010000,1,0000000000000000000,001000
tlbr	R		010000,1,0000000000000000000,000001
tlbwi	R		010000,1,0000000000000000000,000010
tlbwr	R		010000,1,0000000000000000000,000110
#
#CPU Trap Instructions
syscall	R		000000,00000000,00000000,0000,001100
